originalTitle: Vinicius: Eight years at Real Madrid, 20 cases of alleged racist abuse
title: Our Friend Vinicius and Why Kindness Matters!
content:
Hey everyone! It's your friendly news reporter here, bringing you super important stories from our big continent, Africa! Today, we're talking about a very special person. His name is Vinicius Jr. He is a fantastic football player! He loves kicking a ball, just like many of you! We want to talk about him because he is very brave. He is helping to make the world a kinder place for everyone. Let's learn about him together!

Who is Vinicius Jr?

Vinicius Jr. plays football. He plays for a very famous team called Real Madrid. This team is in a country far away, called Spain. Vinicius is very fast. He is very good at scoring goals! Many people love to watch him play. He has a big smile and loves football so much. He started playing football when he was a little boy, just like you might be doing now! He worked very hard to become a great player. He wants to win big games and make his team proud. Did you know? Football is the most popular sport in the whole world! Many, many people play it and watch it!

What is Racism? (It's Not Fair!)

Now, let's talk about something that is not kind. It's called racism. Racism is when some people are mean to other people because of their skin color. Or because of where they come from. It's like saying, "I don't like you because your skin is different from mine." This is not fair. It is not right. Everyone has different skin colors. Some people have dark skin, some have light skin, some are in between! All skin colors are beautiful. Racism makes people sad. It makes them feel like they don't belong. It hurts their feelings very much. Imagine if someone was mean to you just because of how you look. That would not feel good, would it? Did you know? There are so many beautiful colors in the world, just like there are so many beautiful skin colors! Every color is special.

Mean Words on the Field

Sometimes, when Vinicius Jr. plays football, some people in the crowd say very mean things to him. These mean words are because of his skin color. This is racism. It has happened many, many times. Too many times! Imagine you are playing your favorite game. And people start shouting unkind words at you. Just because of how you look. How would that make you feel? It makes Vinicius Jr. feel sad. It makes him feel angry. He loves playing football. But these unkind words spoil the fun. No one should have to hear such mean things. Especially when they are just trying to play a game they love. Did you know? Football teams often have players from many different countries around the world! They all play together as one team.

Vinicius Jr. is a Brave Hero!

But Vinicius Jr. is not just sad or angry. He is also very, very brave! He doesn't want other people to go through this. So, he speaks up! He tells everyone that racism is wrong. He tells people to stop being mean. He wants football to be a safe and happy place for everyone. No matter their skin color. He wants all players to feel loved and respected. He is like a superhero fighting for kindness! When he speaks up, he helps other people who might be treated unfairly too. He shows them that it's okay to speak out. He shows them that they are not alone. He is saying, "Let's all be kind to each other!" Did you know? Being brave means you do the right thing, even when it's hard or scary! Vinicius Jr. is very brave.

Why This Matters to All of Us

You might think, "I am just a kid. I live far away in Africa. Why does this matter to me?" Well, it matters a lot! Kindness is important everywhere. In your school, in your home, in your village, and on the football field! We all deserve to be treated with respect. We all deserve to feel safe and happy. When Vinicius Jr. fights against racism, he is fighting for a world where everyone is treated fairly. He is fighting for you. He is fighting for your friends. He is fighting for everyone! When we see someone being unfair, it's important to know that it's wrong. And it's important to try and make things better. Did you know? Sharing is a way of being kind. When we share our toys or our food, we show kindness to our friends!

What Can We Do?

So, what can you do, my young friends? 1. **Be kind to everyone.** Play fair with all your friends. No matter what they look like or where they come from. 2. **Speak up (safely).** If you see someone being mean to another person, tell a grown-up. A teacher, a parent, or another trusted adult. They can help. 3. **Learn about different people.** The world is full of amazing people from different places! Learn about their stories and traditions. It makes us smarter and kinder. 4. **Remember Vinicius Jr.'s bravery.** Be inspired by him! He shows us that one person can make a big difference. Did you know? Being a good friend means treating everyone how you would like to be treated! That's the Golden Rule!

Let's Make a Kind World!

Vinicius Jr. is spending many years playing football for Real Madrid. But he is also spending his time making sure football is fair for everyone. He has faced many difficult moments. But he never gives up. He keeps playing. He keeps speaking. He wants to score goals for his team. And he wants to score goals for kindness and fairness too! Let's all cheer for Vinicius Jr.! And let's all try to be kind, just like him. Together, we can make our world a happier, fairer, and kinder place for everyone. Thank you for listening, my wonderful friends! Until next time, stay kind!
summary: Vinicius Jr. is a brave football player who stands up against people being mean because of skin color, helping to make the world a kinder place for everyone.
whyMatters: It is important because everyone deserves to be treated with kindness and respect, and Vinicius Jr. shows us how to be brave and fair.

title: 'Defamation campaign' against Prestianni - Benfica
content: Benfica claim there is a "defamation campaign" against Gianluca Prestianni as Uefa launch an investigation into claims he racially abused Real Madrid's Vinicius Jr.

originalTitle: Is VAR any better in the rest of Europe's top leagues?
title: Is VAR any better in the rest of Europe's top leagues?
content: You do not need to look far to find people proclaiming that VAR works fine outside the Premier League. BBC Sport spoke to people across Europe's top leagues to find out.
